p: There were a number of climate variables that we did not expect to have a correlative relationship with Δ leaf, but we addressed to ensure that they were not confounding variables (MAT, maximum summer temperature, latitude, seasonality). Due to the consistent internal temperature and lack of relationship between Δ leaf to MAT in previous studies, we expected no relationship between Δ leaf and MAT nor maximum summer temperature. As we expected, MAT showed no significant relationship with Δ leaf values neither in meta-analyses, growth chamber experiments ( Diefendorf et al., 2010; Schubert & Jahren, 2012) nor this study ( Fig. S1A).
